- Kitchen – Refrigerator: leaking water; visible moisture around unit. Location: kitchen; appliance (refrigerator). Action: inspect water line, drain pan, and possible base cabinet damage.

- Kitchen – Dishwasher: leaking water; evidence of moisture near appliance. Location: kitchen; built-in appliance. Action: inspect supply hose, drain line, and cabinet/drywall behind.

- Bedroom – Window: broken window in bedroom. Location: primary bedroom. Materials: window glass/frame. Action: immediate repair or temporary barrier to prevent injury.

- Exterior – Front entry lighting: lack of power/light at front. Location: exterior entry. Action: verify breaker, fixture, and wiring for exterior lighting.
